translations: my prayer and my rites of sacrifice
and my living and my dying
puzzle.hint: A powerful declaration of total devotion and sincerity, stating that every aspect of a believer's life and death belongs solely to Allah.
puzzle.arabic: قُلْ إِنَّ صَلَاتِى وَنُسُكِى وَمَحْيَاىَ وَمَمَاتِى لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
puzzle.verseEn: Say, "Indeed, my prayer, my rites of sacrifice, my living and my dying are for Allāh, Lord of the worlds.
